headline.print_headline: Issa Releases Kerry From Benghazi Testimony
headline.main: Issa Releases Kerry From Benghazi Testimony

lead_paragraph: The chairman of the House Oversight committee on Friday released Secretary of State John Kerry from his obligation to testify next month about the deadly Benghazi attack, allowing a newly formed select committee to move forward in questioning the top diplomat.
